import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { ModalController } from '@ionic/angular';
import { NewPlanComponent } from './../../../components/new-plan/new-plan.component';
import { PlanDetailComponent } from './../../../components/plan-detail/plan-detail.component';
import { ApiService } from './../../../services/api/api.service';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-savings',
  templateUrl: './savings.page.html',
  styleUrls: ['./savings.page.scss'],
})
export class SavingsPage implements OnInit {

  plan = false;
  plans: any[];
  loading = true;
  TtlAmt = 0;
  TotalTgtAmt = 0;
  TotalPercentage = 0;
  copy: any[];

  constructor(
    public modalController: ModalController,
    private api: ApiService
  ) { }

  ngOnInit() {
    this.getPlans();
  }

  getPlans() {
    this.TtlAmt = 0;
    this.TotalTgtAmt = 0;
    this.TotalPercentage = 0;
    this.api.allPlan().then((res) => {
      if (res.length > 0) {
        res.forEach((item) => {
          // tslint:disable-next-line: radix
          const amt = parseInt(item.card.amount);
          this.TtlAmt += amt;
          // tslint:disable-next-line: radix
          const trgtAmt = parseInt(item.targetAmount);
          this.TotalTgtAmt += trgtAmt;
          item.percentage = (amt / trgtAmt) * 100;
        });
        this.TotalPercentage = (this.TtlAmt / this.TotalTgtAmt) * 100;
        console.log(res);
        this.copy = [...res];
        this.plans = res;
        this.plan = true;
        this.loading = false;
      } else {
        this.plan = false;
        this.loading = false;
      }
    }).catch((err) => {
      console.log(err);
    });
  }

  async newPlan() {
    const modal = await this.modalController.create({
      component: NewPlanComponent,
      backdropDismiss: false,
      swipeToClose: false
    });
    await modal.present();
    const { data } = await modal.onWillDismiss();
    console.log(data);
    if (data !== undefined) {
      this.getPlans();
    }
  }

  async editPlan(plan: any) {
    const modal = await this.modalController.create({
      component: PlanDetailComponent,
      componentProps: { plan },
      backdropDismiss: false,
      swipeToClose: false
    });
    await modal.present();
    const { data } = await modal.onWillDismiss();
    console.log(data);
    if (data !== undefined) {
      this.getPlans();
    }
  }

  deletePlan(id: string) {
    this.api.deletePlan(id).then((res) => {
      this.getPlans();
    }).catch((err) => {
      console.log(err);
    });
  }

  doRefresh(event: any) {
    this.getPlans();
    event.target.complete();
  }
}

<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-buttons slot="start">
      <ion-menu-button autoHide="false"></ion-menu-button>
    </ion-buttons>
    <ion-title>Savings</ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content class="ion-padding">
  <ion-refresher slot="fixed" (ionRefresh)="doRefresh($event)">
    <ion-refresher-content></ion-refresher-content>
  </ion-refresher>

  <ion-fab vertical="top" horizontal="end" slot="fixed">
    <ion-fab-button (click)="newPlan()">
      <ion-icon name="add"></ion-icon>
    </ion-fab-button>
  </ion-fab>

  <ion-grid>
    <ion-row>
      <ion-col size="7">
        <div class="text top">
          <p>Total Savings</p>
          <h2>{{TtlAmt | currency:"NGN":"symbol-narrow":'3.0'}}</h2>
        </div>
      </ion-col>
      <ion-col size="5" class="ion-text-end">

      </ion-col>
    </ion-row>
  </ion-grid>

  <div class="container">
    <div class="progress">
      <circle-progress [percent]="TotalPercentage" [radius]="100" [outerStrokeWidth]="16" [responsive]="true">
      </circle-progress>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div>
    <ion-grid>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <h2 *ngIf="plan">
            All Plans
          </h2>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      <ion-row *ngIf="!plan && !loading">
        <ion-col size="2"></ion-col>
        <ion-col size="8">
          <div class="ion-text-center shadow ion-activatable ripple-parent" style="border: 1px solid #d19115;"
            (click)="newPlan()">
            <h4>It seems you have no plans yet, tap to get started</h4>
            <ion-ripple-effect></ion-ripple-effect>
          </div>
        </ion-col>
        <ion-col size="2"></ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      <ion-row *ngIf="!plan && loading">
        <ion-col size="6">
          <div class="skeleton">
            <ion-skeleton-text animated style="height: 100%;"></ion-skeleton-text>
          </div>
        </ion-col>
        <ion-col size="6">
          <div class="skeleton">
            <ion-skeleton-text animated style="height: 100%;"></ion-skeleton-text>
          </div>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>

      <ion-row *ngIf="plan">
        <ion-col size="6" *ngFor="let p of plans">
          <div class="plan ion-activatable ripple-parent">
            <div style="width: 100%;">
              <div class="ion-float-right" style="padding: 8px;" (click)="deletePlan(p._id)">
                <ion-icon slot="icon-only" name="trash"></ion-icon>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="subPlan" (click)="editPlan(p)">
              <circle-progress [percent]="p.percentage" [radius]="45" [outerStrokeWidth]="5" [showInnerStroke]="true"
                [innerStrokeWidth]="1"></circle-progress>
              <p>{{p.planName}}</p>
              <ion-ripple-effect></ion-ripple-effect>
            </div>
          </div>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
    </ion-grid>
  </div>
  <!-- <div *ngIf="!plan" style="width: 100%; margin-top: 8px;" class="ion-text-center">

}
